description: close to The Franklin Stop (2, 3, 4, 5), great restaurants and cafe's, as well as a wine shop right around the corner. Less than a 10 minute walk to the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, Brooklyn Museum, and Prospect Park. You’ll love the light, high ceilings,  comfy bed, and proximity to so many great spots.
name: Spacious & Fully Furnished in Central BK
review: Great location and a spacious one-bedroom, good for short/medium term stays. Express trains stop here which is handy to Manhattan. Felt like staying at a friend's apartment. A good friendly experience.
